title: Aren't they wonderful
brief_description: Newsreel type presentation pf a Scottish gun dog training school; what happens when you dial the police emergency number; and a performance by Felix Mendelssohn and his Hawaiian Serenaders in Sophisticated Hula. Series is Pathe Pictorial.
